byline.contributor: Jason Rodríguez Grafal reported from Ponce, and Frances Robles from Key West, Fla.
byline.original: By JASON RODRÍGUEZ GRAFAL and FRANCES ROBLES

abstract: Officer Guarionex Candelario Rivera of Puerto Rico Police force fatally shoots colleagues Luz M Soto, Rosario Hernandez and Frank Roman at regional headquarters in Ponce; Rivera has a history of psychological issues and is under guard while receiving treatment for gunshot wounds sustained during encounter.
lead_paragraph: A police spokeswoman said that the officer held a female lieutenant, a male commander and a policewoman hostage at a station before he killed them.

headline.main: Puerto Rican Police Officer Held in Fatal Shooting of 3 Colleagues
headline.print_headline: Veteran Puerto Rico Police Officer Is Held After the Fatal Shooting of 3 Colleagues

snippet: A police spokeswoman said that the officer held a female lieutenant, a male commander and a policewoman hostage at a station before he killed them.
